cards.title: Planetfall
setup: Put {Planetfall} into play, “Infiltration” side up. Put [i]Higgs Field Amplifier[/i] into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever {Planetfall} would be dealt 3 or more damage, reduce that damage by 2.
When a Chip enters play from the villain deck, {Planetfall} regains 2 HP, then play the top card of the villain deck.
When a villain Mega card enters play, flip {Planetfall}.
At the end of the villain turn, {Planetfall} deals the hero character with the lowest HP {H - 2} toxic damage.
cards.advanced: When {Planetfall} flips to this side, {H - 2} players each discard 1 card.
flippedGameplay: Whenever {Planetfall} would be dealt 2 or fewer damage, reduce that damage by 1.
When a Chip enters play from the villain deck, {Planetfall} deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 projectile damage, then play the top card of the villain deck.
When a villain Micro card enters play, flip {Planetfall}.
At the end of the villain turn, {Planetfall} deals the {H - 1} hero targets with the highest HP 2 sonic damage each.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When {Planetfall} flips to this side, she deals each non-villain target 1 melee damage.
cards.challengeText: Whenever an environment card is destroyed, {Planetfall} regains {H - 1} HP.

openingLines.default: I claim this world in the name of the Thorathian Empire. Hail Imperator Voss! Hail Dok'Thorath!

cards.title: Adhesive Grenade
body: When a hero target would deal damage to {Planetfall} or this card, first move this card next to that hero target.
When this card is destroyed, it deals the target next to it 3 fire damage.

cards.title: Aggression Booster
body: Play this next to the environment target with the highest HP. Redirect damage that would be dealt to this card to that target.
Increase damage dealt by environment targets to hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Bio-Infiltration
body: {Planetfall} deals the hero with the highest HP {H - 1} irreducible melee damage. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of the villain turn.

cards.title: Crack Foundations
body: {Planetfall} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage, then deals each target 1 projectile damage.
Destroy {H - 1} hero Ongoing cards.

cards.title: Disassembler
body: Play this next to the hero with the most Equipment cards in play. At the start of that hero's turn, this card deals itself or that hero 2 melee damage.
When this card is destroyed, destroy 2 Equipment cards.

cards.title: Higgs Field Amplifier
body: If {Planetfall} is Tiny, increase damage dealt by {Planetfall} by 1.
If {Planetfall} is Huge, reduce damage dealt to {Planetfall} by 1.

cards.title: Kinetic Enclosure
body: Play this next to the hero with the highest HP. Whenever that hero would deal 3 or more damage, prevent that damage and this card regains 1 HP.
When this card is destroyed, put it on top of the villain deck.

cards.title: Neural Disruptor
body: Play this next to the hero with the most Ongoing cards in play. At the start of that hero's turn, this card deals itself or that hero 2 psychic damage.
When this card is destroyed, destroy 2 hero Ongoing cards.

cards.title: Remote Activation
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until {H - 1} Chips are revealed. Discard the revealed cards.
Play the topmost {H - 1} Chips from the villain trash. If [i]Higgs Field Amplifier[/i] is in the villain trash, play it.

cards.title: Remote Detonation
body: {Planetfall} deals the X hero targets with the highest HP 2 projectile damage and 2 fire damage each, where X = the number of Chips in the villain trash.
If X was 1 or less, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Shatter Sanctuary
body: Destroy 2 non-target environment cards.
{Planetfall} deals each Chip and each non-villain target X projectile damage, where X = 3 plus the number of non-target cards destroyed this turn.

cards.title: Tangleweb Netting
body: Play this next to the hero with the lowest HP. Redirect damage dealt by that hero to this card.
Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.

cards.title: Techno-Infiltration
body: {Planetfall} deals each hero target X lightning damage, where X = the number of Equipment and/or Device cards from that target's deck in play plus 2.
Destroy {H - 1} Equipment cards.
